name: consumer-record-retrieval-test-app
description: NHS Digital NRL Consumer Record Retrieval Test App

scripts.cpf: cp -r "src/responses" "src/static" "src/README.md" "src/README.html" "dist/src" && cp dist-static/* package.json package-lock.json dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir "dist/src" && ts-node make-doc && npm run cpf && tsc --p tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.dev: npm run build-dev && npm run start-dev

author: lionel.rowe1@nhs.net
